While the aesthetics are stimulating and unlike any you'll find elsewhere

Our campus is perpetually in motion. Our students start and join

, kick-start businesses, run organizations and are deeply involved with the community. Our fans fill the stands for some of the most storied  teams in NCAA history. And the entire student body attends events like
— the annual festival to kick off the new school year, which has featured top performers  like Jay-Z, T.I. and LMFAO. It's just the opening act of an unforgettable UCLA experience.

Our world-renowned faculty do not only teach. They make discoveries and develop new innovations. Their groundbreaking research and expertise inform policymaking and news media coverage around the globe.
